meaningMnemonic: Remember how 手 can mean a "doer" in some words? What do you think your <kanji>help</kanji> <kanji>doer</kanji> is? It’s someone who helps you, so it’s your <vocabulary>assistant</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>helper</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>aid</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You learned the on'yomi reading of 手 with the vocabulary word 投手.
